name: Think Of Some Gift
description:
Soon is your special one's birthday. You have to find a present for them, but you don't have the first clue yet. That's ok, breathe, go out and take a stroll to get inspired. You'll eventually think of something.

Featuring 27 different endings and over 4000 possible paths!

Made with Ink and Unity. Submitted at the 2021 Ink Jam.

Credits
  • Axel de Conti - Game Dev
  • Leslie Astier - Art
  • Lucas Friche - Music/Sound Design
  • Martin Ringot - Writing/Narrative Design
